definitions: the flexible part of a whip or something resembling it.
shortDefinitions: flexible part of whip or something resembling it

definitions: the lashing action of a whip

examples.text: he cringed before the icy whiplash of Curtis's tongue

shortDefinitions: used of something resembling blow with whip

definitions: injury caused by a severe jerk to the head, typically in a motor-vehicle accident

examples.text: suffering from whiplash, he spent weeks with his neck in a collar

shortDefinitions: injury caused by severe jerk to head

definitions: jerk or jolt (someone or something) suddenly, typically so as to cause injury

examples.text: the force of impact had whiplashed the man's head

shortDefinitions: jerk or jolt person or thing suddenly

definitions: move suddenly and forcefully, like a whip being cracked

examples.text: he rammed the yacht, sending its necklace of lights whiplashing from the bridge

shortDefinitions: move suddenly and forcefully, like whip being cracked
